thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 109 of 7354
thread.title: Bob

author: Bob
title: Bob
text: My experience in purchasing products from B & H Photo for my business and personal use is most likely based on owning a business. They have a tremendous selection of products, their products are competitively priced and they deliver in a timely manner. What really sets them apart from the competition is their business model. It appears that they have segmented their sales staff into various departments based on the product you are purchasing. The sales people have been highly trained and are able to discuss a given product line or item in layman's terms. Isn't it all about selection, price and customer service.
